sentences.sentence: The young pale wind-flowers had arisen by the wood, and under the hazels, when perchance the hot sun pushed his way, new little suns dawned and blazed with the real light.
sentences.translation: 嫩白的风信子盛开在树林中，在榛树下，当强烈的阳光照耀着它时，像太阳似的花朵突然绽放，并带着灿烂的光芒。

sentences.sentence: Objective: To observe the effects of Hazels flower on decreasing blood sugar and clarify its mechanisms.
sentences.translation: 目的：观察榛花的降血糖作用并初步阐明其作用机理。
